page.title: 16My Daily Diet by Louisa
page.content: {Breakfast}for me means a bowl of cereal, usually Rice Crispies.To go with my cereal I have a cup of tea.I sometimes have a boiled egg when we have run out of cereal. At{first break}at school I have some fruit ,usually an apple of which I like Granny Smiths best. For my{lunch}I bring chocolate spread sandwiches and a packet of crisps,I like prawn cocktail flavour best.I sometimes have a chocolate biscuit. I have some biscuits{after school. } Then at 6.00p.m. we have our{main meal We have a set menu which means we have something different every night but the same every week.On Mondays we have a roast and on Fridays we buy fish and chips from "The Copper Kettle" restaurant to eat at home. At bedtime I have a cup of tea.
